projects.heading: DevOps Co-Op
content: Led the architecture and implementation of the infrastructure monitoring tooling for the organization, monitoring 1,000+ servers, switches, and load balancers across a hybrid multi-cloud environment, using SolarWinds with a suite of custom tooling built with PowerShell, Jenkins, Django, Vue.js, Docker, RDS, and EC2
Built a custom deployment pipeline to configure application server monitoring across production blue-green deployments of immutable infrastructure, using Jenkins, Spinnaker, AWS, and PowerShell
Built production multi availability-zone cloud environments with Spinnaker and Terraform using immutable infrastructure on AWS
Demonstrated new monitoring capabilities to airline clients by leading technical demos, while gathering feedback to further optimize the new platform

Assisted a major airline with a PSS (passenger service system) cutover, optimizing internal infrastructure and coordinating with external stakeholders to ensure performance and stability of the new environment

projects.heading: Data Engineer, Co-Op
content: Architected and implemented the automation and deployment process for all product data using NiFi, ElasticSearch, MongoDB, Python, and Java, enabling daily updates of products that were previously updated every month

Worked with the Director of Engineering to design and build the structure for data ingestion of product data, using Apache NiFi for data orchestration, MongoDB for state management, and Python for data transformations
Cut the data platform onboarding time of new partners in half by developing standardized config driven components
Built custom Apache NiFi processors in Java to improve automation and stability in our data flows
Helped develop a dynamic CSS injection system for the flagship whitelabel Ruby on Rails application

projects.heading: Full Stack Engineer, Co-Op
content: Engineered countless new features on our customer facing Ruby on Rails application while performing thorough AB testing, helping to double our conversion rate

Built the marketing analytics suite on our platform using a hybrid of client-side and server-side tracking, collecting actionable data on millions of users using Google Tag Manager, jQuery, Mixpanel, and Ruby on Rails

projects.heading: Research Assistant, Developer
content: Pioneered technical solutions to a university-wide research project focused on improving participation in grant requests, ultimately developing a system over 40% more effective than its predecessor

projects.heading: Owner, Founder
content: Created and managed two virtual servers that hosted an environment for gamers to play Minecraft with each other, achieving a 436% ROI
Hired, trained, and led a staff team of over 15 people to support our 6,500+ unique players

projects.heading: Board Member, Vice President
projects.about: The Victoria McGrath Foundation is a 501(c)(3) organization founded in 2018 with a goal of 'opening doors and uplifting lives'. Founded in memory of my sister Victoria, and motivated by her heart for serving others, it is a means to support worthy causes by providing them with resources and financial support.

projects.heading: Teacher at the Mamelodi Initiative
projects.about: The Mamelodi Initiative is a not-for-profit organization focused on improving the lives of residents in Mamelodi, South Africa. By providing resources to enable community engagement and education, the Mamelodi Initiative strives to empower members of the community so that the community can make the changes it wants to see.

projects.heading: Eagle Scout
content: Spearheaded an Eagle Scout project designing and carrying out a renovation project with the help of fellow Scouts for the Weston Historical Society, fulfilling a 100+ hour of community service requirement in order to achieve the Eagle Scout rank
